pERCEPTOR:


Perceptor took his weapon and ran towards the exit.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "lordunitronx" <KSLawDogg@c...> wrote:
> (If I haven't responded to my sister for three weeks, why the hell 
> would I respond to you? :)
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer:
> 
> 
> He received Megatron's orders.  "Oh, fine," he replied over the 
comm. 
> to Megatron, "it's not like I'm not slaggin' busy!" he yelled, 
> throwing everything he was carrying down.  He drew his trusty laser 
> rifle from subspace.  The Predacon gave it a quick look over to 
make 
> sure it wasn't damaged in the crash.  It wasn't.
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer headed for the nearest way out of this Maximal 
> deathtrap of a ship.
